text: illeo galodoe naega hananim anin daleun geos-eul naui bohojalo taeg haneunyo geubun-eun cheonjileul changjohasyeoss-eu myeo uliege il-yonghal yangsig-eul jusa geubunkkeneun il-yonghal yangsig-i pil-yochi aniham-ila illeogalodoe naege myeonglyeong-i iss-eoss-euni jeil meonjeo hana nimkke sunjonghayeo bulsinjadeul-ui muli gaunde issji malla hasyeossnola
